infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Sexy Awakening uses your location to show you people near you and to display how far away your matches are.

infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Sexy Awakening uses your location to show you people near you and to display how far away your matches are.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take pictures for your online presence.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the Photo Library to upload pictures for your online presence.
